vis_parts_nbody.F90

00001 ! ======================
00002 !
00003 !   VIS_PARTS
00004 !
00005 !   Send particle data to VISIT for real-time visualisation
00006 !
00007 !
00008 ! ======================
00009 
00010 subroutine vis_parts_nbody(vcount)
00011 
00012 
00013   use physvars
00014   use treevars
00015   implicit none
00016   include 'mpif.h'
00017 
00018 ! Buffer arrays vbuffer, vbuf_local allocated in setup_arrays 
00019 
00020   integer, dimension(num_pe) :: nparts_pe, recv_strides, nbuf_pe  ! array of npp on each PE
00021   integer :: icolour(nbuf_max)
00022   integer :: lvisit_active, nskip, nproot, ne_buf, ni_buf, npart_buf, nbufe, nbufi
00023   integer :: i, j, k, ioffset,ixd, iyd, izd, ilev, lcount, wfdatai
00024 
00025   real :: s, simtime, dummy, xd,yd,zd, dx, dz, dy, epond_max, box_max, epondx, epondy, epondz,phipond
00026   real :: plasma1, plasma2, plasma3, t_display, wfdatar, u2, amp_las, box_x, box_y, box_z
00027   integer :: nship, ierr, cpuid
00028   integer :: type
00029   integer :: vbufcols = 22, incdf, ndom_vis, ivisdom, ndomain_vis=1000
00030   real :: lbox, work_ave, upmax, uproton_max, uxmax
00031   logical :: vis_debug=.false.
00032   logical :: pick=.false.
00033   integer :: vcount
00034 
00035 
00036   convert_mu=1.
00037   simtime = dt*(itime+itime_start)
00038 
00039   pick_particles: select case(vis_select)
00040   case(1,3) 
00041     nproot = npart
00042   case(2)
00043     nproot = n_layer(1)
00044   case default
00045     nproot=0
00046   end select pick_particles
00047  
00048   if ( nproot > nbuf_max-ndomain_vis) then
00049         nskip = nproot/nbuf_max + 2
00050   else
00051         nskip = 1
00052   endif
00053 
00054   if (me==0 .and. nproot> nbuf_max-ndomain_vis) then
00055         write(*,*) "VISNB | # particles > vis nbuf_max - reducing number shipped"
00056         write(*,*) "VISNB | nbuf_max=",nbuf_max," nskip=",nskip
00057   endif
00058 
00059   if (beam_config==4) then
00060      amp_las = vosc*min(1.,simtime/tpulse)
00061   else 
00062      amp_las = vosc
00063   endif
00064 
00065 !    if (.not. launch) then
00066        t_display = vcount
00067 !    else if (beam_config>=3 .and. beam_config<=6) then
00068 !       t_display = tlaser*convert_fs
00069 !    else
00070 !      t_display = simtime
00071 !    endif
00072 
00073   if (beam_config<=3) then
00074      plasma1 = Ukine*convert_keV
00075      plasma2 = Ukini*convert_keV
00076   else
00077      plasma1=sigma
00078      plasma2=tpulse
00079   endif
00080 
00081   if (nskip>1 .and. uthresh==-1) uthresh=vte**2
00082 
00083   nbufe = 0
00084   nbufi = 0
00085 
00086   if (me.eq.0) then
00087      nship=1  ! leave gap on root for info block (filled in later)
00088   else
00089      nship = 0
00090   endif
00091 
00092   ! Filter out particles for shipping
00093   type = 1
00094   upmax = 0.
00095   uxmax = 0.
00096   uproton_max=0.
00097      ! TODO:  separate interesting ions and electrons
00098      do i=1,npp
00099         u2=0.5*0.511*mratio_layer(1)*(ux(i)**2+uy(i)**2+uz(i)**2) ! in MeV
00100        pick_part: select case(vis_select)
00101         case(1)  ! select from bulk
00102           pick = ( npart<nbuf_max .or. (npart > nbuf_max .and. mod(pelabel(i),nskip).eq.0)) 
00103         case(2)  ! select from 2nd layer
00104           pick = (  mod(pelabel(i),nskip).eq.0 .and. pelabel(i)>npart-n_layer(1) )
00105         case(3)  ! select above energy threshold 
00106           pick = (u2>uthresh)
00107         case default
00108           pick = .false.
00109         end select pick_part
00110 
00111       if (pick) then 
00112         nship=nship+1
00113         if (q(i)<0) then
00114           nbufe=nbufe+1
00115         else
00116           nbufi=nbufi+1
00117         endif
00118 
00119           upmax = max(upmax,u2)
00120           uxmax = max(1.d0*uxmax,ux(i))
00121         ! Store attributes for visualizing
00122         vbuf_local(0,nship) = t_display
00123         vbuf_local(1,nship) = dt
00124         ! scaled coordinates
00125         vbuf_local(2,nship) = convert_mu*x(i)
00126         vbuf_local(3,nship) = convert_mu*y(i)
00127         vbuf_local(4,nship) = convert_mu*z(i)
00128         ! velocities
00129         vbuf_local(5,nship) = ux(i)
00130         vbuf_local(6,nship) = uy(i)
00131         vbuf_local(7,nship) = uz(i)
00132         ! E-field
00133         vbuf_local(8,nship) = Ex(i)
00134         vbuf_local(9,nship) = Ey(i)
00135         vbuf_local(10,nship) = Ez(i)
00136         vbuf_local(11,nship) = 0.
00137         vbuf_local(12,nship) = 0.
00138         vbuf_local(13,nship) = 0.
00139         vbuf_local(14,nship) = pelabel(i)
00140         vbuf_local(15,nship) = 0.
00141         vbuf_local(16,nship) = type ! particle type
00142         vbuf_local(17,nship) = q(i)
00143         vbuf_local(18,nship) = m(i)
00144         vbuf_local(19,nship) = pepid(i)
00145         vbuf_local(20,nship) = 0.
00146         vbuf_local(21,nship) = 0.
00147        endif
00148      end do
00149 
00150      ! Find # particles to collect from each cpu
00151      call MPI_ALLGATHER( nship, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nparts_pe,1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00152      call MPI_ALLREDUCE( upmax, uproton_max, 1, MPI_REAL, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00153 
00154      ! Total buffer lengths/pe
00155      nbuf_pe=nparts_pe*attrib_max
00156 
00157      recv_strides(1:num_pe) = (/ 0,( SUM( nbuf_pe(1:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe ) /)
00158 
00159      npart_buf = (SUM(nparts_pe))  ! global total # particles to visualize
00160 
00161      call MPI_ALLREDUCE( nbufe, ne_buf, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00162      call MPI_ALLREDUCE( nbufi, ni_buf, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00163 
00164 
00165      if (npart_buf>0 .and. npart_buf < nbuf_max-ndomain_vis) then
00166         ! send  particle data from all PEs
00167         ! increase momentum threshold if close to max ship # 
00168         if (1.0*npart_buf/nbuf_max > 0.9) uthresh=uthresh*1.1
00169 
00170         call MPI_GATHERV( vbuf_local, nship*attrib_max, MPI_REAL, vbuffer, nbuf_pe, recv_strides, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00171 
00172 
00173         ! Ship to visualization
00174         if (me.eq.0) then
00175 
00176            ! Stick info block in front of particle data on root
00177 
00178            type=8
00179 
00180               vbuffer(0,1) = t_display
00181 !              vbuffer(1,1) = npart_buf-1
00182               vbuffer(1,1) = npart
00183               ! scaled coordinates
00184               vbuffer(2,1) = t_display
00185               vbuffer(3,1) = 0
00186               vbuffer(4,1) = 1
00187               ! velocities
00188               vbuffer(5,1) = npart_buf-1
00189               vbuffer(6,1) = npart
00190               vbuffer(7,1) = ops_per_sec
00191               vbuffer(8,1) = uproton_max
00192               vbuffer(9,1) = 0.
00193               vbuffer(10,1) = 0.
00194               vbuffer(11,1) = 0.
00195               vbuffer(12,1) = 0.
00196               vbuffer(13,1) = 0.
00197               vbuffer(14,1) = 0.
00198               vbuffer(15,1) = 0.
00199               vbuffer(16,1) = type ! particle type
00200               vbuffer(17,1) = 0.
00201               vbuffer(18,1) = 0.
00202               vbuffer(19,1) = 0.
00203               vbuffer(20,1) = 0.
00204               vbuffer(21,1) = 0.
00205 
00206               work_ave=SUM(work_loads)/num_pe
00207 
00208 
00209              ! Add branch nodes to show domains
00210               ndom_vis=0
00211               if (ndomain_vis>0) then
00212 
00213 ! First count how many to be shipped
00214 
00215               do k=1,nbranch_sum
00216              
00217                  ilev = log( 1.*branch_key(k) )/log(8.)
00218                  ixd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(k),3*i,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00219                  iyd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(k),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00220                  izd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(k),3*i+2,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00221                  lbox = boxsize/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00222                  box_x =  xmin + lbox*(ixd+.5) ! box centres
00223                  box_y =  ymin + lbox*(iyd+.5) ! box centres
00224                  box_z =  zmin + lbox*(izd+.5) ! box centres
00225 
00226                  if (box_z < domain_cut) ndom_vis=ndom_vis+1
00227               end do
00228 
00229               ivisdom = 0
00230               do k=1,nbranch_sum
00231              
00232                  ilev = log( 1.*branch_key(k) )/log(8.)
00233                  ixd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(k),3*i,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00234                  iyd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(k),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00235                  izd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(k),3*i+2,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00236                  lbox = boxsize/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00237                  box_x =  xmin + lbox*(ixd+.5) ! box centres
00238                  box_y =  ymin + lbox*(iyd+.5) ! box centres
00239                  box_z =  zmin + lbox*(izd+.5) ! box centres
00240 
00241                  if (box_z < domain_cut) then   ! only show domains below z=domain_cut
00242                     ivisdom=ivisdom+1
00243                     j=npart_buf+1+ivisdom
00244                     ! Store attributes for visualizing
00245                     vbuffer(0,j) = t_display
00246                     vbuffer(1,j)= box_x
00247                     vbuffer(2,j)= box_y
00248                     vbuffer(3,j)= box_z 
00249                     vbuffer(4,j) = lbox
00250                     vbuffer(5,j) = branch_owner(k)  ! cpu id of branch node
00251                     cpuid = branch_owner(k)+1
00252                     vbuffer(6,j) = work_loads(cpuid)/work_ave   ! total work load of branch node/cpu
00253                     vbuffer(7,j) = npps(cpuid) ! total # particles on cpu
00254                     vbuffer(8,j) = 0.
00255                     vbuffer(9,j) = 0.
00256                     vbuffer(10,j) = 0.
00257                     vbuffer(11,j) = 0.
00258                     vbuffer(12,j) = 0.
00259                     vbuffer(13,j) = 0.
00260                     vbuffer(14,j) = 0.
00261                     vbuffer(15,j) = 0.
00262                     vbuffer(16,j) = 16    ! Domain type
00263                     vbuffer(17,j) = ndom_vis  ! Total # branch nodes
00264                     vbuffer(18,j) = 0.
00265                     vbuffer(19,j) = 0.
00266                     vbuffer(20,j) = 0.
00267                     vbuffer(21,j) = 0.
00268                  endif
00269                  !        write (*,'(7f13.4)') vbuffer(1,j),vbuffer(2,j), vbuffer(4,j), vbuffer(5,j), & 
00270                  !             vbuffer(6,j), vbuffer(7,j), vbuffer(17,j)
00271               end do
00272 
00273               endif
00274 
00275 ! Fill out dummy values for netcdf
00276               do j=npart_buf+1+ndom_vis,nbuf_max
00277                  vbuffer(0:attrib_max-1,j) = 0.
00278               end do
00279 
00280 ! ---- Preprocess VISIT setup -----------
00281 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00282 
00283      if (me==0) then 
00284         write(*,*) 'VISNB | Display time/count ',t_display
00285         write(*,*) 'VISNB | # particles shipped ',npart_buf,nship
00286         write(*,*) 'VISNB | # branches shipped ',ndom_vis, '/', nbranch_sum
00287         write(*,*) 'VISNB | Total # objects shipped :',ndom_vis+1+npart_buf,' /',nbuf_max
00288         write(*,*) 'VISNB | u_thresh: (MeV)     ',uthresh
00289         write(*,*) 'VISNB | ux, up_max: (MeV)     ',uxmax, upmax, uproton_max
00290         write(*,*) 'VISNB | vis_select=  ',vis_select
00291         if (vis_debug) then
00292           write(*,*) 'VISNB | t,1,x,y,z,q,label,owner,type :'
00293           do j=1,npart_buf
00294                  write (*,'(i6,6f12.4,2i5,3i6)') j,vbuffer(0,j),vbuffer(1,j),vbuffer(2,j), vbuffer(3,j), vbuffer(4,j), &
00295                      vbuffer(17,j), int(vbuffer(14,j)),int(vbuffer(19,j)),int(vbuffer(16,j))
00296           end do
00297         endif
00298      endif
00299 
00300               call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00301 ! send particles and branch boxes together
00302               call flvisit_nbody2_partstep_send(vbuffer,npart_buf+ndom_vis+1,attrib_max)
00303 ! netcdf needs fixed buffer size, so take max used for initialisation
00304 #ifdef NETCDFLIB
00305               if (netcdf) then
00306                 call ncnbody_put(ncid,vbuffer,nbuf_max,attrib_max,incdf)
00307                 write(*,*) "VIS_PARTS | Writing particles to netcdf"
00308                 endif
00309 #endif
00310 
00311               !
00312               !        write (90,*) 'local',i
00313               !        write (90,'((22(f12.5/)//))') vbuf_local(0:attrib_max-1,i)
00314               !        write (90,*) 'global',i
00315               !        write (90,'((22(f15.8/)//))') vbuffer(0:attrib_max-1,i)
00316               !        write (90,*) vbuffer(0:attrib_max-1,i)
00317               !              end do
00318 #else
00319 !  --- No VISIT installed ----
00320 #endif
00321 !  --- end preprocess --------
00322 
00323            endif
00324 
00325         else
00326            ! Just send particles on root
00327 
00328 ! TODO: this needs removing or fixing
00329 
00330            if (me==0) then
00331               if (npart_buf>nbuf_max-1000) then
00332                  write(*,*) 'VISNB | Too many particles to ship: npart_buf= ',npart_buf,'/',nbuf_max
00333                  uthresh = uthresh*2
00334                  write(*,*) 'VISNB | Increasing momentum threshold to: ',sqrt(abs(uthresh))
00335               else if (npart_buf==0 .and. ne > 0) then
00336                  uthresh = vte*2
00337                  write(*,*) 'VISNB | Reducing momentum threshold to: ',sqrt(abs(uthresh))
00338               endif
00339               nproot = 0.8*npart/num_pe ! fixed # parts close to npp
00340 
00341               !           call flvisit_spk_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00342 !              call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00343               !        call flvisit_spk_info_send(npp,xl,yl,zl,zl,nep,nip,np_beam,itime+itime_start)
00344               wfdatai=int(tlaser)
00345               wfdatar=tlaser
00346               !           call flvisit_spk_info_send(nproot,xl,yl,zl, t_display, &
00347               !                x_crit, amp_las, sigma, tpulse, &
00348               !                ne,ni,npart,wfdatai)
00349               !           call flvisit_nbody2_info_send(t_display,xl,yl,zl, xl, &
00350               !             t_display, amp_las, plasma1, plasma2, xl, &
00351               !             xl, xl, xl, xl, xl, & 
00352               !             xl, xl, xl, xl, xl )
00353               !           call flvisit_spk_particles_send(t_display,x,y,z,ux,uy,uz,q,pepid,pelabel,npp)
00354               !        call flvisit_nbody2_particles_send(t_display,xvis,yvis,zvis,vx,vy,vz,qvis,ppid,plabel,npart_buf)
00355            endif
00356         endif
00357 
00358 
00359         ! Make sure everyone else knows about new momentum threshold
00360         call MPI_BCAST( uthresh, 1, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00361 
00362         call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Wait for everyone to catch up
00363 
00364         vcount=vcount+1
00365 
00366       end subroutine vis_parts_nbody
